description: The Banks Low Bunion GTX focuses on maximum comfort and high-quality materials. The shoe is made of the finest nubuck and suede leather and also equipped with a waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX membrane for wetter days. In addition, this comfortable low-cut model also benefits from its cushioning sole package. This ensures a balanced and pleasant roll-off for the foot. The special `Futura´ tongue construction allows easy entry into the shoe and uncomplicated adjustment. How? It prevents the tongue from slipping outwards or creating unwanted creases. And what’s more, both the materials and the shoe itself are made in Europe. From walks in your local woods to moderate hiking in lower mountain ranges – the Banks Low Bunion GTX is at home on all trails.
name: HanWag Banks Low Bunion GTX - Mens
